name: Predation
description:
Small metroidvania where you are a creature trying to become the strongest by defeating the Apex. Devour the different alphas in order to get their abilities and get more powerful.

Entry for the Metrodvania Month 19 Jam

Controls:

Move:  Arrow Keys

Crouch: Down Arrow key

Devour: Attack while crouching

Attack: X

Jump: Z

Dash (when obtained): C

Spit (when obtained): V

Developed by Lia Katido and Kokomaus
